level.heading: Rulemaking authority.
level.text: The Mayor shall issue rules to carry out the provisions of this act in accordance with § 2-505.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) addition of section, see § 23 of Toll Telecommunications Service Tax Temporary Act of 1989 (D.C. Law 8-4, May 23, 1989, law notification 36 DCR 4154).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-26, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-3901.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: "This act," referred to in this section, is D.C. Law 8-26, which is primarily codified as § 47-3901 et seq.
